statements: SELECT * FROM experimental_equipment ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, description, quantity FROM experimental_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM experimental_equipment WHERE location LIKE 'Lab%';
SELECT * FROM experimental_equipment WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, equipment_name, location FROM experimental_equipment WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM experimental_equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, description FROM experimental_equipment WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT id, description, location FROM experimental_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT quantity, location FROM experimental_equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Micro%' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT id, equipment_name, acquisition_date FROM experimental_equipment WHERE location IN ('Lab A', 'Lab B') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM Equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, quantity, price FROM Equipment WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT equipment_id, action FROM EquipmentLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC
SELECT name, price FROM Equipment WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE name LIKE '%hammer%'
SELECT * FROM equipment_logs;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM experimental_equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, log_date FROM equipment_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM experimental_equipment WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT equipment_id, location_name, room_number FROM equipment_locations WHERE room_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM experimental_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM experimental_equipment WHERE price <= 1000;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM equipment_logs GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5;
SELECT location_name, room_number FROM equipment_locations WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM experimental_equipment JOIN equipment_locations ON experimental_equipment.equipment_id = equipment_locations.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE manufacturer = 'Example Manufacturer';
SELECT equipment_id, manufacturer, quantity FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_logs WHERE log_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment_details WHERE warranty_duration > 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment_inventory WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, log_description FROM equipment_logs WHERE log_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, quantity FROM equipment_inventory INNER JOIN equipment_categories ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = equipment_categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Category1';

SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory INNER JOIN equipment_details ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = equipment_details.equipment_id WHERE warranty_duration > 1 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, equipment_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Repair';
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, name, location FROM equipment WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT equipment.name, categories.category_name, transactions.transaction_date FROM equipment INNER JOIN categories ON equipment.equipment_id = categories.category_id INNER JOIN transactions ON equipment.equipment_id = transactions.equipment_id WHERE transactions.transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT maintenance_id, equipment.name AS equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM maintenance INNER JOIN equipment ON maintenance.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
